```{r setup}
library(here)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	error = TRUE,
	message = TRUE,
	warning = TRUE
)
ggplot2::theme_set(ggplot2::theme_bw())

```


```{r prepare_codebook}
library(codebook)
codebook_data <- rio::import(here("data_public/Study1d_public.rds"))
```

```{r saving-reliabilities}
# save reliability object for caching
reliability_data <- compute_reliabilities(codebook_data)
# compress and save (otherwise 5GB < file size)
write_rds(reliability_data, here("data_public", "reliability", "s1d_reliability.rds"), compress = "gz")
```


```{r codebook}
codebook(codebook_data)
```
